comments.content:
Hi there thriller 08,

The general opinion about the EA FIFA 14 interface font seems to favour Titillium, which is available for D/L from here:  
 [http://www.campivisivi.net/titillium/text/stili](http://web.archive.org/web/20131224221944/http:/www.campivisivi.net/titillium/text/stili "http://www.campivisivi.net/titillium/text/stili")  
Personally, I'm not so sure, because the letter C appears to be a slightly different shape.  
Check it out and see what you think!

Or you could always ask the guys who designed the game at Electronic Arts.

Doghouse Studio
Ehh, I guess it's close enough but there's a lot of differences between them.
Good call, sir. That would get my vote!
Wow! That's it! Perfect! Thank you so much man!
